price: Nuko tumufatana n’ingabo ze maze tubajugunya mu nyanja kandi agayitse (kubera ibikorwa bye by’ubuhakanyi).
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami wahuwa mulīmun
